resources.string:
In order to get functionality of Dynamic Wallpaper which changes throughout the day, Kaagaz Requires to Keep a Background Service Running.

Due to Limitations of Android System you'll need to Disable Battery Optimisations

The Battery Consumption is negligible.

NO DATA IS SENT ANYWHERE NEITHER STORED EVER, No Permission is required to run Kaagaz
Navigate To Battery>Battery optimisation>Tap NOT OPTIMISED>All apps>Kaagaz>Don\'t Optimise or ANY OTHER BATTERY EXCLUSIONS AVAILABLE
After Doing The Above Step, Restart the App and Voila! Your Dynamic Desktop will be then delivered to you in a while!
TIP: To achieve the best results, try restarting during the last few minutes of the current hour!
